interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AllWell Beauty | Moisturizing Exfoliating Botanical Radiant Face and Body Mask | With Red Maple, Safflower, & Lavender | Made in the USA | Vegan, Cruelty-Free | 5 Count, 0.5 Fl. Oz. Travel Packs
Review Date: 2022/02/26
Store: AllWell AllOver
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AllWell AllOver', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Material Type Free': 'Phthalates', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.26 x 2.6 x 1.06 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '850012824268'}
Review Text: This mask has helped my skin feel soo soft and smooth. It does an excellent job hydrating the skin that it feels so nice. I love that it comes in individual packets as it makes it easier for travel. It also doesn't have funky smell like others I have tried in past, this is important to me. I definitely would recommend!
Review Title: Love it!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Nu-pore Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch - Blemish Patches to care for Blemish Control, scar prevention, must haves tools for skincare. korean makeup trusted cosmetics secret k-beauty. 60 Patches
nu-pore
{'Brand': 'Nu-pore', 'Item Form': 'Patch', 'Product Benefits': 'Blemish Control', 'Scent': 'Hydrocolloid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 1.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '780707702413'}
I tend to breakout a lot especially week prior to menstrual period. These pimple patches do a great job in minimizing pimple size and inflammation. I put it on at night before bed and when I wake up in the morning, the pimple is almost gone. It has good adhesion, mine did not come off during sleep. I definitely recommend.
Helps minimize inflammation
Eggplant Clearing Cleansing Oil Pad 60 pads, Makeup remover pad. Exfoliating. Simple easy quick wipe. Moisturizing cleansing oil pad
PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN
{'Brand': 'PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 3.82 x 2.72 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
Love these cleansing pads. I typically use fragrance free body oil to remove eye makeup, but was happy to see same thing in a pad. I was worried it would irritate the eyes, but it didn't! I used one pad for both eyes to remove waterproof mascara and eyeliner. No irritation and it took everything off! Definitely recommend!
Removes stubborn makeup, even waterproof mascara!
Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz
Gryph & IvyRose
{'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'}
This is my third purchase from this brand! I got their shampoo/body wash and conditioner. Their products are amazing and I love the natural ingredients! Lotion is very hydrating for kids skin and has a nice scent. Quick absorbing and leaves skin feeling very soft and smooth. Definitely recommend!
Great natural lotion for kids
Large Silk Scrunchies For Hair - Tara Sartoria Artisan Handmade
Tara Sartoria
{'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Tara Sartoria', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.37 x 3.9 x 0.71 inches; 1.09 Ounces'}
These are very beautiful and feel really nice. They do good job holding my medium thick hair. Does not pull on hair. Makes great gift too!
Beautiful and soft

It also doesn't have funky smell like others I have tried in past, this is important to me. I definitely would recommend!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

**Skincare Preferences:** The user remains dedicated to managing acne and blemish control while prioritizing hydration for sensitive skin. Recent interactions reflect a growing appreciation for moisturizing products that offer gentle exfoliation and come in convenient, travel-friendly formats. 

**Treatment Methods:** The user continues to favor topical solutions with a focus on ease of use, now also incorporating hydrating masks that enhance skin softness and smoothness, aligning with their holistic skincare approach.

**Product Characteristics:** The emphasis on natural, cruelty-free ingredients persists, along with a preference for products that avoid irritating components. The user values products that provide effective hydration without strong fragrances or harsh chemicals, which is crucial for their skin sensitivity and is also family-friendly.

**Purchase Behavior:** While K-beauty remains a staple, there’s an evident expansion towards brands that focus on botanical and vegan formulations. The user demonstrates an interest in multi-functional products that combine hydration and gentle exfoliation, and their selection of quality accessories emphasizes both aesthetics and practical benefits.

**Overall Trends:** The user continues to adopt a comprehensive skincare routine that seeks to balance acne management with effective hydrating solutions. Their recent purchases indicate a commitment to quality, convenience, and elevated self-care experiences, showcasing an interest in innovative, easy-to-use products suited to individual and family needs.
